attributes.action: Keep David Mcgreavy and all child killers behind bars til death.
attributes.additional_details: The three children he chose to murder never got a chance to use their voice, please use yours and help this petition again strength.
attributes.background: This petition is to overturn the parole board decision to release child killer David Mcgreavy. Him and ALL child killers should never be paroled and should spent every day of their natural lives behind bars as they are not candidates for rehabilitation.

rejection.details:
This isn't something that the UK Government and Parliament can do. 

Decisions about releasing prisoners into the community are taken by the Parole Board, which is independent. The Government and Parliament can't change the Parole Board's decision.

You can find out more about the Parole Board here:
https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/parole-board/about
